tool_description: Calculates total shared centimorgans and genetic distance metrics from identified DNA segments between two profiles.

profile_1_id.description: Identifier of the first DNA profile

profile_2_id.description: Identifier of the second DNA profile

segment_data_source.description: Source of segment data: segment_matcher, uploaded_segments, manual_input

include_x_chromosome.description: Whether to include X chromosome segments in calculations

error_messages: Profile not found: One or both profile IDs do not exist in the system.
No segment data: No shared segments found for the specified profiles.
Invalid data source: Use one of [segment_matcher, uploaded_segments, manual_input].
Calculation error: Unable to calculate centimorgans due to invalid segment data.
X-chromosome error: X chromosome analysis requires compatible gender profiles.
usage: Provide two profile IDs and specify the source of segment data. Optionally include X chromosome segments. Returns total shared DNA measurements in centimorgans.

autosomal_cm.description: Shared DNA on autosomal chromosomes in centimorgans

x_chromosome_cm.description: Shared DNA on X chromosome in centimorgans

shared_segments_count.description: Number of segments used in calculation

calculation_confidence.description: Confidence level of the cM calculation
